name: @plattar/plattar-api
description: Module for interfacing with the Plattar API (https://www.plattar.com)

scripts.build: rm -rf build && browserify --standalone Plattar index.js -o build/plattar-api.js && uglifyjs build/plattar-api.js --output build/plattar-api-min.js
scripts.build-es2015: babel build/plattar-api.js --presets=@babel/env > build/plattar-api-es2015.js && uglifyjs build/plattar-api-es2015.js --output build/plattar-api-es2015-min.js

author: plattar
